Operation Management This feature is used to manage service operations. A service contains one or more operations, and these service operations appear in the Published Operations section on the Operations of Service page.The following quality of service configuration options are available for the operations: response caching, access throttling, flows, modules, parameters.
For example, you will get the following screen , when you click the Hello Service that contains a single operation called greet.
Figure1. Operations list
Managing Operations
In the navigator, under Manage/Services, click List. The Deployed Services page appears.
Click the service name for which you want to configure the operations. The Service Dashboard page appears.
Click Operations in the Quality of Service Configuration panel. The Operation of Service page appears.
You can click on the available actions for the service, or
Click the service name to view the Operation Dashboard page. Actions for the operation will be available in the Quality of Service Configuration panel.
Figure2 . Operation Dashboard
Field Descriptions
Operations Dashboard
Field Name Description
Response Caching Use this option to configure response caching
Access Throttling Use this option to configure access throttling for the selected operation
MTOM Enables/disables MTOM
Flows View the configured flows graphically
Modules Engages modules for the selected operation
Parameters Edits/deletes operation parameters.
